help.name: Help
help.desc: Lists all available commands and description

purge.name: Purge
purge.desc: Deletes messages by 'n' number of messages (<14 days old)

response.invalid: I can't purge by __n__ number of posts. :thinking:
response.noscope: Some of the posts you want me to delete are too old (>14 days) for me to delete. :confused: Try entering a smaller number.

response.MissingArg: You need to "@" mention a user to properly use this command. :confused:
You need to specify a number of days of inactivity to prune by
response.InvalidArg: Invalid number of days specified. Must be a number between 1-30

info.name: Info
info.desc: Creates MessageEmbeds using chapters from the config

response.MissingArg: You need to tell me which chapter to give you info for

errors.unknown: I haven't learned that command yet. My dev is still working hard on adding new ones though. :neutral_face:
errors.noPermsBot: I don't have permission to do that. :confused:  Tell an admin to do the thing.
errors.noPermsUser: You aren't allowed to use that command. :shrug:
errors.noAccess: That command can't be used in DMs. :thinking:
errors.fail: Failed to run command. My diagnostics indicate the following issue:
